definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Jiapigou gold deposit lies in the lower part of the late Archaean greenstone belt.
sentences.chinese: 夾皮溝金礦產於晚太古宙綠巖帶的下部層位。

sentences.english: The favourable prospecting criteria in this region is gold deposits concentration area near the margin…
sentences.chinese: 本區有利的找礦方向是地臺邊緣金礦集中區。

sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 從含砷金礦石中回收金一直是浮選研究的重要課題。

sentences.english: Who would exhuming the largest gold?
sentences.chinese: 這次誰將掘出最大的金礦？

sentences.english: Jianchaling gold deposit is closed related to the Jianchaling ultrabasic rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 煎茶嶺金礦與煎茶嶺超基性岩體有密切的成因聯繫。

sentences.english: The solid mineralizing model for a underground gold mine is researched on the basis of orebody block as a unit.
sentences.chinese: 以礦塊爲單位，研究某地下金礦的實體礦化模型。

sentences.english: Jinchangyu Gold Mine experienced four great structural movements. Each movement appeared in the form of folds and fractures.
sentences.chinese: 金廠峪金礦經歷了四期大的構造形變。

sentences.english: The features of aeromagnetic gradient anomalies about the gold deposits are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 總結了金礦牀上航磁梯度異常的變化規律。

sentences.english: Shancheng gold ore deposit is a fault controlled quartz-vein type gold ore deposit in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山城金礦爲石英脈型金礦，受斷裂構造控制。

sentences.english: Shancheng gold ore deposit is a fault controlled quartz-vein type gold ore deposit in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山城金礦爲石英脈型金礦，受斷裂構造控制。

sentences.english: The project belongs to metallurgic mineral field.
sentences.chinese: 本項目屬冶金礦產領域。

sentences.english: C She got the gold mine, he got the shaft.
sentences.chinese: 她分了金礦，他得到的是茅杆。

sentences.english: The Lizigou gold deposit in Song Country, western Henan Province, China, belongs to the altered tectonic type ore golden deposit.
sentences.chinese: 豫西嵩縣栗子溝金礦屬於構造蝕變巖型金礦牀。

sentences.english: The general characteristics of greenstone type gold deposits in Lingbao area of HenanProvince have been analysed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了河南靈寶地區綠巖型金礦一般地質特徵。

sentences.english: I had been living for weeks in rough mining camps with other gold miners.
sentences.chinese: 幾個星期以來我一直活在粗糙的礦場和其他黃金礦工。

sentences.english: The pyroelectricity characteristics of pyrite can be used as the indicators for prospecting of gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黃鐵礦的熱電性特徵可作爲金礦的找礦標誌。

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
